name: The Best 15 Google Fonts in 2022 with pairings
description:
Hello!

Thank you for visiting my little project, I hope you are doing well.


Here you can find type specimens of the 15 most popular Google fonts that can perfectly be paired together.


After duplicate this file, please click the Present button and hit Space bar to explore my works. You can also click the name of each font to learn more and download it.


Cheers,

Tom.
